title: #27: The Murder of Reeva Steenkamp and Sentencing of Oscar Pistorius
description:
Laura Richards (formerly of New Scotland Yard, Founder and Director of Paladin, National Stalking Advocacy Service) and Lisa Zambetti (Casting director for Criminal Minds) re-visit the murder of Reeva Steenkamp and examine the manipulations by her killer Oscar Pistorius who received a six year sentence for murder, despite the fact that the minimum sentence is fifteen years.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
